content: **knitted jumper with short sleeves in drops muskat or drops cotton merino piece is knitted top down with round yoke and lace pattern size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-805 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 450-500-550-600-650-700 g colour 89 light sea green or use drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-550-600-650 g colour 29 sea green **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size
